Name: Last Minute
About the game: Last Minute is a single-player first-person story game set in the woods. Life was getting pretty tough for you in the city, you just lost your job and the constant outside city-noise has been disturbing you a lot. You decided it‘s best if you move out with the dog you care about the most, somewhere peaceful and quiet – into the woods. Shortly after setting in the woods, something disastrous happens. Note: Last Minute is a video game that includes minimal violence. The game is suitable for children 13 and over. Key features: -Calm, emotional story that lasts 1 hour. -Amazing soundtrack that illustrates current events. -Detailed, lush wilderness environment
